All you have to do is delete every class file in the client, recompile, rejar,resign. rep? :D? lol

item.title: Uploading webclient!
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“oxygen-_, post:2, topic:427447”]You cannot upload a webclient. Go to http://dropbox.com/ and make an account…Upload the .jar file inside of the “public” folder…For a webclient, you’ll have to use html.

I used this:

[code]

change to your server name [/code]

rep++ would be great? :D[/quote]
He can’t rep++ but I see your good at webclients wana help me fix my error saying “Cannot find main class client program will now exit”?

Read full topic
